ygData.subject: RE: Secret Code (OOC)
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry friend I made up the last ones on the spot to emphasize a point - that most acronyms are made up on the spot and not everyone knows what they are. DBBA -
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry friend I made up the last ones on the spot to emphasize a point - that
most acronyms are made up on the spot and not everyone knows what they are.

DBBA - Double Bladed Bone Axe
LBA - Large Bronze Armor
LG - Lupine Gauntlets
BIBS - Blackened Iron Bastard Sword (this is an actual one that is used in
the game).

> ----------
> From: weya[SMTP:weya@...]
> Reply To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Sent: Saturday, July 24, 1999 4:40 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Secret Code (OOC)
>
> From: "weya" <weya@...>
>
> Ok, I went to the secret decoder page and none of those acronyms were
> listed
> there.
>
> So clue us in ... what's a BIBS, a DBBA, LBA, and a LG? Cuz I have no
> idea
> what they are.
>
> In fact, half the time I have no idea what people are auctioning off cuz
> they use acronyms. How do I know I want it? If it's not something I've
> seen before (ex, from a different continent) then I have no idea what the
> acronym means to me.
>
> Anyways ... thanks for the decoder page. It will come in handy when I
> just
> can't figure out what people are talking about. :-)
>
> Safe travels,
> Wynsong
> Student - Soerbaird Academy
> Fenin Ro
>
>
